alert.note: Alert for Davie; Iredell; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 09 at 5:30PM EST until January 09 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Davie County in the piedmont of North Carolina... Iredell County in the piedmont of North Carolina... Rowan County in the piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 900 PM EST. * At 530 PM EST, Excessive runoff will linger into the evening hours across the warned area. Remain wary of flooding of low-lying areas throughout the Hunting Creek, South Yadkin, Second Creek and Grants Creek basins. Lingering high water conditions will slowly recede throughout the I-85 and I-77 corridors which includes but is not limited to greater Statesville and Salisbury. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
